title: Crane's Pie Pantry Restuarant
content:
Could someone please ID this serif typeface?

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017032558/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_52.jpg) | 108.12 KB |
author: andy_ab11

comments.content:
Engravers Bold. It's hard to tell which one because of the method of reproduction.  
It's available through a number of foundries, here are a few:

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/engravers-size-one/bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017032558/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/engravers-size-one/bold/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/engravers-size-one/bold/")  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/engravers-sb/medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017032558/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/engravers-sb/medium/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/engravers-sb/medium/")  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/engravers/d-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017032558/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/engravers/d-bold/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/engravers/d-bold/")
